MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void ParseURL (Java.Net.URL? u, string? spec, int start, int limit);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ParseURL(class Java.Net.URL u, string spec, int32 start, int32 limit) cil managed
abstract member ParseURL : Java.Net.URL * string * int * int -> unit override this.ParseURL : Java.Net.URL * string * int * int -> unit

Docs.param: the URL to receive the result of parsing the spec.
the String representing the URL that must be parsed.
the character index at which to begin parsing. This is just past the ':' (if there is one) that specifies the determination of the protocol name.
the character position to stop parsing at. This is the end of the string or the position of the "#" character, if present. All information after the sharp sign indicates an anchor.
Docs.summary: Parses the string representation of a URL into a URL object.

format.a: Java documentation for java.net.URLStreamHandler.parseURL(java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int, int).
